name: spo-create-multi-hub-sites
title: Create a multi-hub set of communication sites
shortDescription: This sample builds 9 SharePoint communication sites, creates three hub sites and associates them to a main hub site

thumbnails.alt: Preview of the sample Create a multi-hub set of communication sites

references.name: Want to learn more about PnP PowerShell and the cmdlets
references.description: Check out the PnP PowerShell site to get started and for the reference to the cmdlets.
